Package fr.unice.polytech.citadelle.game

Class Player

java.lang.Object
fr.unice.polytech.citadelle.game.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Player>
public class Player extends Object implements Comparable<Player>
A Player represent a person in the citadel game, with his name, city and gold.
Author:
BONNET Kilian, IMAMI Ayoub, KARRAKCHOU Mourad, LE BIHAN LÃ©o
